attributes.action: ensure that all Government Ministers and Officials ride British-made motorcycles when travelling on official business.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The demise of Rover means that more motorcycles are made by British-owned companies than automobiles. These motorcycles are a major contributor to both the UK "Brand" and its engineering reputation.  
It is therefore incumbent upon the British Government to support locally-owned manufacturing by disposing of its fleet of vehicles sourced from foreign-owned manufacturers, replacing them with British motorcycles for use on official business, fitted with sidecars where appropriate.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
